title: Social Science Competency Strengthening Program Through Video-Based Reasoning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational social science concepts and ability to utilize digital devices
context.additional_context: Learners acquire reasoning skills for analyzing social phenomena and deepen contextual understanding through video content-based projects

learning_goals: Acquire reasoning skills integrating explicit/implicit information by analyzing social issue-related video materials
Enhance the ability to apply three or more reasoning types (cause-effect, prediction, evaluation) through video-based interactive activities

In a PBL environment, learners produce one infographic and one report (≈5 pages) on reasoning results for given social issues (e.g., aging population, regional disparities) and achieve ≥B+ in three of four instructor-provided evaluation criteria (organization, creativity, accuracy, visual effectiveness)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
